data.title: Discovering Lucy Angel
data.meta_description: Cameras follow the country trio Lucy Angel, made up of mom Kate Anderton and daughters Lindsay and Emily, as the artists fight to get to the top.
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Off to the Races

In this first episode, we meet Lucy Angel and her family in their Nashville home as they rehearse and prepare for the biggest gig of their lives. A live performance in front of 100,000 NASCAR fans at the Pocono Raceway.

22 min Â· Jan 13, 2015 TV-14

EPISODE 2

Let's Be Social

As the launch of their first single approaches Lucy Angel find themselves scrambling to find an accomplished producer, all the while getting a crash course on how to use social media to help their name.

22 min Â· Jan 20, 2015 TV-14

EPISODE 3

Single Trouble

Despite hearing bad news about their new upcoming single, the family throws a party for Jake in celebration of his latest risky heart procedure which he emerged from successfully.

22 min Â· Jan 27, 2015 TV-14

EPISODE 4

The Great Outdoors

Wrangling the Anderton's is always a big production and this camping trip proves to be no exception.

22 min Â· Feb 3, 2015 TV-14

EPISODE 5

Happy G-Manninversary

G-Man has a great 40th anniversary planned for Kate, but first the girls lay down a track with Colt Ford.

22 min Â· Feb 10, 2015 TV-14
